attributes.action: Tony Blair should see out his term as Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Back in 2005 I voted Labour for Tony Blair to be Prime Minister, not Gordon Brown. I will not be able to vote Labour again while Gordon Brown is in charge. Tony Blair should see out his term in office as Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
